name: CoachMaster™
tag_list: online-coaching, project-management, fitness, training--development, weight-loss, smoking-cessation, business-strategy, education, career-development, problem-solving, coaching
overview:
CoachMaster™ is the worlds first tool to facilitate real time coaching and problem solving for individuals and teams.

The programme works by providing a structure for the problem solving discussion based on the type of problem that is being addressed. Using the built in structure a coach can guide a individual or a team through all the stages of problem solving until they have clear action steps to move forward. It is a sort of GPS for coaching.

The software is completely browser based, can easily be translated and modified to deal with cultural or organisationally specific issues.

The underlying problem solving process works for many different kinds of problems but the content varies. Significant intellectual knowledge is built into each stage for different kinds of problems. There are special databases of questions to coach a person or a team on specific types of issues. For instance there are question sets to coach sales people, for time management issues, for project management, for career change and to deal with difficult people.

It is currently being used in business where managers develop their coaching skills while working on real problems and issues. In education as a study aid for different subjects and in public health for issues such as weight loss and smoking cessation.
